example.name: transitive
example.text: Comments by John Major , who [*T*-1] has succeeded Mr. Lawson , also failed [*-2] to damp market concern , despite his pledge [*] to maintain relatively high British interest rates .

example.name: transitive with purpose
example.text: But in certain conditions such as autoimmune diseases and allergies and transplant rejection , doctors would like [*-1] to damp the immune response so such cells do n't touch off harmful inflammatory reactions or cell destruction .
